text: ( Source : The University of Hong Kong ) Back 10 Oct 2015 An HKU spokesperson responds to media enquiries today ( October 10 ) as below: 'Both Council Chairman of the University of Hong Kong Dr. Leong Che-hong and President Professor Peter
